body:
Comment 1: 
Some text is not visible when the browser viewport is too small.

Expected behavior would be to either use scroll bars or wrap the lines to make the
content visible. This affects both Chromium and Firefox.

Example screenshots have been attached.

Screen resolution: 1024x768
Chromium viewport: 847x680
Firefox viewport: 846x713
Attachments: 1. firefox.png (42686 bytes) 1. chromium.png (49562 bytes)
